minidraw.standard
Class MiniDrawApplication

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      minidraw.standard.MiniDrawApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, DrawingEditor
public class MiniDrawApplication
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements DrawingEditor

MiniDraw Application. This is the main window. You provide it with an abstract factory for configuring the application. Author: Henrik Bærbak Christensen Implementation note: MiniDrawApplication ASSUMES that the DrawingView returned from the factory is a subclass of JPanel. If not you have to override the createContents method to handle this!

See Also:
Serialized Form
